title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 820.7 - Separability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 820.7 - Separability

State Regulations

If any section, clause or provision of this Part shall be
unconstitutional, or be invalid or ineffective in whole or in part, to the
extent that it is not unconstitutional, invalid or ineffective, it shall be
valid and effective and no other section, clause or provision shall on account
thereof be deemed invalid or ineffective. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
820.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
